metadata.title: itFolks Tech | Software Development & AI Consultancy
metadata.description: We transform ideas into high-quality code. Specialized in web development, mobile apps, Python backend solutions, generative AI and intelligent agents.

hero.title: We Transform Ideas
hero.description: A technology consultancy focused on agile and modern development. We combine technical expertise with generative AI and intelligent agents to deliver solutions that make a difference.

services.title: Our Expertise
services.description: We offer specialized solutions to accelerate your digital transformation with modern technologies and artificial intelligence

web.title: Web Development
web.description: Modern, responsive applications built with React, Vue.js, and Next.js. Pixel-perfect interfaces with exceptional user experience.

mobile.title: Mobile Apps
mobile.description: Native and cross-platform applications with Flutter and React Native. Seamless experiences on iOS and Android.

backend.title: Python Backend
backend.description: Robust and scalable APIs with Python. Data automation, integrations, and high-performance processing systems.

payments.title: Payment Integrations
payments.description: Secure implementation of Stripe and other payment gateways. Subscriptions, marketplaces, and complete checkout flows.

ai.title: AI & Automation
ai.description: Generative AI solutions, intelligent agents, and workflow automation with n8n. We transform manual processes into smart, autonomous flows.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.description: Passionate professionals specialized in generative AI and intelligent agents, turning complex challenges into elegant solutions

raul.name: Raul
raul.bio: Leading frontend architecture, mobile development and AI projects. Specialist in generative AI, intelligent agents and agile management with Scrum.

leo.name: Leonardo
leo.bio: Building modern web applications and mobile experiences with Next.js, React, and React Native. Experience with n8n and generative AI.

higor.name: Higor
higor.bio: Expert in building robust APIs with Node.js, Strapi CMS, n8n automations, and generative AI and intelligent agents solutions.

athos.name: Athos
athos.bio: Python developer focused on data engineering, process automation, and implementing generative AI solutions.

pedro.name: Pedro
pedro.bio: Python developer specialized in automation, data processing, and integration of intelligent agents and generative AI.

projects.title: Real Projects
projects.description: Real cases showing the client's pain point, how we solved it, and the technologies used

scheduling.title: Scheduling System
scheduling.pain: Client faced problems with manual scheduling: time conflicts, frequent no-shows, and wasted time with agenda management.
scheduling.solution: We developed a website and automatic scheduling system integrated with calendar, automatic notifications, and intelligent time management.

trmil.title: Trmil
trmil.pain: Company needed a professional digital presence to attract new clients and showcase their services in a modern, trustworthy way.
trmil.solution: We created a modern, responsive, SEO-optimized institutional website with design aligned to the brand identity.

prontu.title: Prontu / Tupuca
prontu.pain: Need to connect sellers and buyers on an efficient digital platform with order and payment management.
prontu.solution: We developed a complete marketplace platform with seller registration, product catalog, cart, checkout, and admin dashboard.

meihub.title: Mei Hub
meihub.pain: Individual micro-entrepreneurs (MEI) had difficulty managing their tax obligations, finances, and documents in one place.
meihub.solution: We created a complete mobile app for MEI management with financial control, obligation reminders, and document issuance.

methodology.title: Our Methodology
methodology.description: We use the best agile practices to ensure quality and predictable deliveries

scrum.title: Scrum
scrum.description: Well-defined sprints with planning ceremonies, daily standups, reviews, and retrospectives for continuous improvement.

deliveries.title: Bi-Weekly Deliveries
deliveries.description: Delivery cycles every two weeks, ensuring the client sees real progress and can give constant feedback.

tools.title: Professional Tools
tools.description: We use Jira for task management and Miro for brainstorming, wireframes, and collaborative visual planning.

techStack.title: Technologies We Master
techStack.description: We use the best tools in the market to deliver cutting-edge solutions

footer.description: Technology consultancy focused on agile development, generative AI and intelligent agents.
